channel.title: Ftb questionz
channel.description:
hi guise
i like just bot minecraft yesterday for teh legitnezz (srsly i just couldnt find a cracked client for ftb/tekkit)
and yeah. well i downloaded the ftb launcher, and it loads extremely slow (sticks on the 'Mojang' white screen thing for about 5-10 minutes.) upon logging in, everything is extremely laggy, and i only get about 2-3 fps -- with everything turned on minimal) :(
is there any way to remove certain things from the mod pack, or are they required? i know i have a shit laptop :(

item.title: Ftb questionz
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

[quote=“kickingjamie, post:12, topic:525278”][quote author=Vain_ link=topic=644022.msg4334618#msg4334618 date=1374159229]
Normal minecraft without optifine I get about 10-15 fps. With optifine I get 20-30 depending on biome / settings.
[/quote]
Seems like overall your set up just can’t handle minecraft. And the bad part is, FTB tends to get more and more laggy the better you get at it, when you start adding more machines and cables etc to your set up things start to get worse. I’d suggest getting some new hardware or just give up because you’ll always experience lag judging by your experiences so far.[/quote]i dont mind ‘lagging’ or not being able to get the best out of it. but i can’t even walk as of right now. it’s like a stop motion video.

Read full topic

item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

Vain_:

Normal minecraft without optifine I get about 10-15 fps. With optifine I get 20-30 depending on biome / settings.

Seems like overall your set up just can’t handle minecraft. And the bad part is, FTB tends to get more and more laggy the better you get at it, when you start adding more machines and cables etc to your set up things start to get worse. I’d suggest getting some new hardware or just give up because you’ll always experience lag judging by your experiences so far.

Read full topic

What is normal Minecraft like?

item.title: Ftb questionz
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

Well I do have a two shitty laptops. Haven’t tried it on one of them yet. Will try on my other one and then install optifine to both tomorrow. Hopefully I can get it to at least 15 fps or more.

Read full topic

item.title: Ftb questionz
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Bowser jr, post:7, topic:525278”]Try using optifine.[/quote]This. Find the optifine version that matches the version of MC you are modding (either 1.4.7 or 1.5.1 most likely) and add that into the core mods when you ‘edit modpack’ in the launcher.

Also, the long loading time on the mojang screen is normal, but if it’s really 5-10 minutes your PC probably can’t handle those modpacks.

Read full topic

item.title: Ftb questionz
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

Well I know my display driver is shot to hell as well. Crashes all the time during rs and I get gay balloon notifications “display driver has recovered from an unknown stop” or some crap. My pc sucks I just try to get as much out of it as I can.

Read full topic

item.title: Ftb questionz
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:4, topic:525278”][quote author=HcoJustin link=topic=644022.msg4334364#msg4334364 date=1374104043]
Which pack are you using?
[/quote]tried using mindcrack or w.e the mopar ftb server uses. i wanted to get whitelisted, but no point if i can’t get to where i can actually play.

[quote author=kickingjamie link=topic=644022.msg4334363#msg4334363 date=1374104005]
Did you spawn in an area with lots of large trees? They can cause a lotttt of lag on low spec PCs.
[/quote]i did, i spawned in a forest. :([/quote]
It actually uses the latest ultimate now. But if you want to play on a server, you are required to have all of the server sided mods. The only ones that you could remove would be VoxelMap, NEI (and any NEIPlugin/Addon), DamageIndicators, and InventoryTweaks.

VoxelMap will help slightly with the FPS, but theres not much else to do. If try the “152wgt” private pack you might be able to benefit from some of the 1.5.x Forge tweaks, but the Moparcraft server doesn’t run it. As for load times, that is perfectly normal. Loading over 100 mods takes its toll.

Read full topic
